snippet: Miguel Cabrera had four hits, including a homer during a five-run sixth inning, as the Detroit Tigers held off the Kansas City Royals on Monday to clinch the American League Central title.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Detroit Tigers beat Kansas City Royals, 6-3, to win the American League Central title; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Miguel Cabrera had four hits, including a homer during a five-run sixth inning, as the Detroit Tigers held off the Kansas City Royals on Monday to clinch the American League Central title.

headline.seo: Cabrera Has Four Hits as Tigers Win Central
headline.main: Cabrera Has Four Hits as Tigers Win Central
headline.print_headline: Cabrera Has Four Hits As Tigers Win Central
